ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We sent Nuh to his people: 'I am a clear warner to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We sent Noah to his people (and he said): "I give you a clear warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Such were the circumstances) when We sent forth Noah to his people. (He said): 'I have been sent to you to warn you plainly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sent Noah to his people to give them the clear warning
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We sent Nooh to his people that, “Indeed I am for you a clear Herald of Warning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We sent Nuh to his people (and he said): "I have come to you as a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We sent Nuh to his people: Surely I am a plain warner for you:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We sent Noah to his people: 'I am for you a warner, and a bearer of good tidings:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We sent Noah unto his folk (and he said): Lo! I am a plain warner unto you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sent Noah to his people. He said, "I have come to you with a clear warning:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We sent Nuh unto his people saying: verily I am unto you a plain warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We sent Noah to his people [to declare]: ‘Indeed I am a manifest warner to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We sent Noah to his people (with a mission): "I have come to you with a Clear Warning:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We sent Nuh (Noah) to his people (and he said): "I have come to you as a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We sent Noah to his nation. (He said:) 'I am a warner for you, and a bearer of glad tidings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We sent Noah to his people, “I am to you a clear warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Indeed, I am to you a clear warner
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:25] And verily We sent Noah to his people [and he said]: ‘I am (annī: a variant reading has innī, in which case ‘he said’ has been omitted) for you a clear warner, one whose warning is plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We sent Noah unto his folk) and when he went to them he said: (I am a plain warner) a warning Messenger who speaks a language you understand (unto you) from Allah.
